text: Triarchy of the Lost Lovers is the third full-length album by Greek extreme metal band Rotting Christ. This album was released in April 1996 on Century Media and was the first album to showcase a steady addition of gothic metal influence to their overall sound. ==Track listing== *Lyrics by Jim Patsouris & Music by Sakis Tolis.
